reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous with its sparkling sequins and consider it nice for the price. Customers disagree on the quality, comfort, and sizing, with some finding it comfortable and true to size while others report poor quality and discomfort. Customers disagree on the skin irritation aspect, with one noting the sequins are scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful affordable and a compliment fetcher
items.body: Fits so nice, good length for me at 5’3’’. With a wedge it barely hit the floor. Love it! Read more
items.author: Mary E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful in Blue!
items.body: This dress was purchased to wear at a wedding. I wanted a dress that was venue appropriate and fit both me and my budget well. I was very pleased; all of my wants and expectations were met. I received many compliments, felt pretty wearing the dress, and loved that it was also totally comfortable throughout the event. It was a good choice and worth every cent. I will absolutely look forward to wearing it again! Read more
items.author: Kathy Clark

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but size up X2 !
items.body: I love this dress but it was too small. I’m typically a size 18 but I know this brand runs small so I ordered the 4X. I got it on but it was skin tight, so sad. If they had one more sz up I’d exchange but they don’t. It’s a beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not that bad looking just not the right fit
items.body: Sleeves were too short and too tight Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Uncomfortable
items.body: This dress was uncomfortable under the armpits. If you go up a size its a little better bit then its to big. I tried medium on walk around house to get use to it..unsuccessful to wear for a wedding. I returned was not worth price to be uncomfortable. Pretty dress tho Read more
items.author: Macia Latimer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Dress was nice super shiny Very nice dress but too formal for what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Daisy Favela

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Short under liner rode up all night long.
items.body: Pros: Looks good, flattering, length was perfect for my height of 5’4” Cons: itchy under the armpits but the real kicker was- I wore spanks under and I was fighting the short liner underneath ALL NIGHT. Wouldn’t have purchased had I seen a review about that. Read more
items.author: kdts0229

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit me perfectly & is gorgeous! Great price too!!
items.body: Fit perfectly! I felt like a princess in this gown. Such a shock to me—no alterations whatsoever!! I got a LOT of compliments while wearing it!! I highly recommend this gown for any formal event!! Read more
items.author: Teresa Sullivan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Short Sleeve Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Short Sleeve Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Short Sleeve Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-grey, B-gold, B-royalblue2, B-wine, B-black, B-lightgreen, B-navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
